title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: The dialog details have duplicated names. Validation should be performed on the first page. The first and second columns should be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. e. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. g. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: a. The marking between the button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. c. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. d. Multiple selection should be allowed, as move up/down can be applied to more than one item. f. The signature preview must be a label that wraps. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover. h.
SR: 1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog. 2. Observe the size of the buttons. 3. Observe that no table entry is selected. 4. Try changing a parameter name to something very long and observe the preview. 5. Open the dialog with a method that has many parameters and observe its size. 6. Check the marking between the button and list. 7. Check the alignment of the top button. 8. Check if the table has a label. 9. Try selecting multiple items and using the move up/down buttons. 10. Check if the signature preview wraps correctly. 11. Check if the background color of the signature preview matches the hover color.
